Title: Blight Containment Protocol
Description:
Runic Blight corruption is spreading from a failed purification site. Contain the contaminated zone before reality coherence degrades further. Deploy containment sigils at corruption nodes.

=== CONTAINMENT PROTOCOL ACTIVE ===
ID: CONTAIN_BLIGHT_SPREAD
Objective: Deploy containment sigils
Priority: CRITICAL
Clearance: Exalted Standing
Reward: Master Purifier designation

Objectives.Description: Deploy containment sigils at corruption nodes
